Shortens Life.--To those who are desirous of becoming efficient laborers in the cause of God I would say, If you are putting an undue amount of labor on the brain, thinking you will lose ground unless you study all the time, you should at once change your views and your course. Unless 


                                                   507 

greater care is exercised in this respect, there are many who will go down to the grave prematurely.--CT 296 (1913).
